title: gOpa vadhUjana
sahitya:
gOpa vadhUjana lOcana vishaya kOTi janmAni saphalAni santu kOmaLa madhura dAmini nirata


anupallavi

  krIDita sarasa rasa rAsa senanga khElita hari pAda padmE uttungE


caraNam    marakatamaya vENi yamunA tIra madhura gOvardhana malaya samIra
suragaNanuta latA kunja kuTIra shObhita rAdhA mukha candra cakOra
